page.title: 07 Flowers of York
page.content: Flowers'is a transport company that transports goods any where in the U.K. Flowers site covers 12 acres including 3\ acres of meadow.Flowers transports good like,sugar,sweets,toys,electrical goods.Flowers own 21 large lorries 20 middle sized lorries 15 small lorries 10 cars 3 vans 2 break down trucks. The lorries are 18.2 metres long.The lorries weigh 12-14 tons,with goods it weighs 38 tones.The manager is Glyn Samuel he has 7 managers running other departments.They have 11 warehouses and 12 fork lift trucks.There are 108 workers in Flowers 10 of them work in the workshop.The offices are on the other side of the road from the work shops.One tyre for a lorry costs Â£400 the total cost for tyres a year is Â£50,000.The total cost a year with out paying workers buying lorries,land or putting up fences is Â£217970.
